explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of artificial neural network (ANN) and nonlinear autoregressive ANN with exogenous inputs (NARX) for predicting stock indexes futures prices.
explanations.deep learning: The use of NARX, a type of neural network, indicates the application of deep learning techniques in the research.
explanations.regression: The paper employs simple linear regression (SLR) as one of the methods to predict futures prices and compare its performance with ANN.
